title: Microsoft | Senior Software Engineer L63 | Bengaluru/Bangalore | Urgent Help Needed
content:

Current CTC: 40 LPA Base Pay + No Bonuses + No RSUs

Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer (L63)
Location: Bengaluru/Bangalore, Karnataka

Relocation: NIL

Total comp for first year (Salary + Signing Bonus + Performance Bonus + Stocks):  53 + 2 + 7.95 + 18 ~= INR 81 Lac
Benefits: Standard MS benefits

Counter Offers held: Mastercard-  53 Lac Base Pay + 15% variable performance bonus + 3.5 Lac Relocation

Going off of other LC posts for Microsoft L63 compensation I want to be able to negotiate for higher signing and stock bonus. Is there room for negotiation on base pay?**

Update: Had a call with HR and they refused to budge on numbers. Willl be accepting above offer as it is the best I have right now.
